page.title: 10HOUSING EXAMPLES OF TYPES.
page.content:
FLAT:Grey Road,ALTRINCHAM.Â£13,950. One bedroomed flat, easily maintained. No garden. Converted period detached family residence.
{HALL}:Large, with two cupboards, one cloak cupboard leading to garage, fitting one car, and one boiler cupboard. {KITCHEN}:Compact, one radiator, three power points. {BATHROOM}:Bath, shower, wash-hand-basin and toilet, one power point. {LIVING ROOM}:Very large. Gas fire. Four power points. {BEDROOM}:Large. Two power points. {RATES}:Â£95 per. year. DETACHED FAMILY HOUSE Green Walk Bowdon.Â£55,950. A well established prewar house -an ideal family home,which comprises of
